name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary: As a results-driven Senior Google Cloud Engineer, I possess extensive experience in **Google Cloud**, **Google Workspace**, and **Windows** systems, complemented by a strong background in networking and Active Directory. With a proven track record in technical project management and customer service, I effectively lead migration projects and provide consulting support to ensure seamless transitions and optimal cloud solutions. My robust skill set is further strengthened by 8 years as a Full Stack Developer, proficient in technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with expertise in frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I have a deep understanding of microservices architecture, CI/CD automation, and compliance standards (HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, SOC 2) while driving the development of enterprise-grade platforms that leverage AI/ML capabilities.
